thread.title: Kareena Kapoor Khan’s BBC Earth behind-the-scene video will remind you of Gulliver’s Travels – watch video
thread.title_full: Kareena Kapoor Khan’s BBC Earth behind-the-scene video will remind you of Gulliver’s Travels – watch video

author: Rajat Tripathi
title: Kareena Kapoor Khan’s BBC Earth behind-the-scene video will remind you of Gulliver’s Travels – watch video
text:
Kareena Kapoor and sister Karisma organise a birthday bash for Randhir Kapoor; B-town attends the grand celebration 
Kareena Kapoor Khan has been announced as the brand ambassador for Sony BBC Earth- “Feel Alive Ambassador” as the channel calls her. We are super excited to see Kareena make her TV debut, even if it is just an association as a brand ambassador. In the beginning the second trimester of her pregnancy, the actress shot for a TVC for the same. We shared behind the scene pictures of her from the shoot, where she was looking flawlessly gorgeous. The first video glimpse is out, and you should be really really excited for the full advert. 
Kareena extensively shot on chroma, as the final product is going to be a visual treat. A gigantic version of Kareena will be seen interacting with nature all over the globe in this grand scale TVC. A few clippings that made their way to this behind-the-scene footage reveal the grandeur of the ad. There are going to be shots of Kareena sitting on a waterfall as if she was dipping her feet in a swimming pool, and Gulliver’s Travel version of her enjoying while watching penguins in the Antarctica. 
The full promo for BBC Earth will be out soon, and we are eagerly waiting for it. And with the launch of Sony BBC Earth Indian audience will have something really watchable. 
Talking about Kareena’s association, a statement was issued by the channel, saying “Kareena has been chosen as she is known to have a spirited, full-of-life personality, both on and off scree. Her vibrant persona, coupled with her love for the natural world, were the key factors in choosing Kareena to represent the most awaited channel of 2017”, the statement further read. 
On the film front, Kareena will be next seen in Veere Di Wedding. Touted to be an out and out chick flick, the movie will also star Sonam Kapoor and Swara Bhaskar in lead roles. Published: February 24, 2017 6:32 pm Topics:
